description: Ensure GDPR compliance with the data retention acknowledgement form.
name: Data Retention Policy Acknowledgement Form

steps.title: Data Retention Policy Acknowledgement Form
steps.text: Please complete the fields below to acknowledge that you have read and understood the organisation's data retention policy. Your acknowledgement is essential for ensuring compliance with data protection regulations. Thank you for your cooperation.

blocks.label: Employee Name
blocks.help: Enter the full name of the employee acknowledging the policy.
blocks.name: name

blocks.label: Email Address
blocks.help: Provide the email address for communication regarding the acknowledgement.
blocks.name: email

blocks.label: Phone Number
blocks.help: Optional: Enter the phone number for any necessary follow-up.
blocks.name: phone

blocks.label: Date of Acknowledgement
blocks.help: Enter the date when the acknowledgement is being made.
blocks.name: date

blocks.label: I have read and understand the data retention policy.
blocks.name: acknowledgement_statement

blocks.label: Signature
blocks.help: Sign to confirm your acknowledgement and agreement with the policy.
blocks.name: signature
